author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
The Android hardening project GrapheneOS is locked out from modifying the OS of a Google Pixel, something that has been key to it's unique goals. Is this truly the end? In this video, we will actually study the Android architecture and build process in detail to show the pieces that involve GrapheneOS and other pieces that involve CalyxOS, iODEOS, LineageOS. Is Android hardening now an impossibility?

title: Deep Dive Into Android: How GrapheneOS Is Locked Out
